name: Usceese - Geheimnis der Vasen
description:
Usceese - Geheimnis der Vasen

A small horror game created for Scream Jam 2020

Controls

Move: WASD / Arrow Keys / Left Stick
Interact: E / R-CTRL / Left Click / Gamepad A / Gamepad Cross

Credits

Game: Adrian Urban
Artwork: Jessica Affüpper
Additional Textures: Textures.com, Texturer.com, Kenney.nl
Additional SFX: Kenney.nl
